Title: The Recall
Writer: Mauro Borrelli (story by), Reggie Keyohara III, Sam Acton King, Teddy Wynne (additional writer)
Actors: Wesley Snipes, RJ Mitte, Jedidiah Goodacre, Laura Bilgeri
Plot: When five friends vacation at a remote lake house they expect nothing less than a good time, unaware that planet Earth is under an alien invasion and mass-abduction.
